gnat.database
Class GeneRepositoryFromDatabase

java.lang.Object
  gnat.database.GeneRepositoryFromDatabase

public class GeneRepositoryFromDatabase
extends java.lang.Object

Retrieves information on a set of genes from a database and compiles them in to a GeneRepository.

Author:
Joerg
